release.action: As the latest Andromda snapshot is now 3.3-SNAPSHOT, it is no longer appropriate to be using 3.2-SNAPSHOT. Therefore, we have upgraded the Andromda plugin to version 3.2.
SyMBA Bug Tracker post: "SyMBA help navigation button returns front page only". Fixed by removing the requirement to log on to view the help pages.
SyMBA Bug Tracker post: "[why?] box on login page does not answer question". Fix for issue 1799676 also resolved this bug.
SyMBA Bug Tracker post: "Link for 'SyMBA project Home Page' is incorrect". Erroneous URL fixed in menu-static.html.
SyMBA Bug Tracker post: "bug with Sample Microarray in sandbox". Error in the LoadFuge class caused erroneous loading, and therefore viewing, of the sample microarray protocols. Now fixed.
SyMBA Feature Tracker post: "ability to turn on/off debug statments". This feature was added for both RealizableEntityServiceImpl and CisbanHelper

release.description: Upgrade to Maven 2, Promotion to SourceForge
